text: Melicope christophersenii is a species of plant in the family Rutaceae known by the common name Waianae Range melicope. It is endemic to the Hawaiian Islands. It is threatened by habitat loss. It was named in honour of Erling Christophersen. ==References== christophersenii Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Biota of Oahu Category:Waianae Range Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Melicope christophersenii
